name: Apple Panic
description: Apple Panic is a 1981 platform game —from before the term existed—for the Apple II programmed by Ben Serki and published by Brøderbund Software. Apple Panic is an unauthorized version of the 1980 arcade game Space Panic. While the arcade original remained obscure, Apple Panic became a top seller for home computers. It was ported to the Atari 8-bit family, VIC-20, and IBM PC (as a booter).
